div.head: 小便遺數
div.div: minor relief with frequent loss [of urine]; repeated involuntary loss of urine

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: minor relief with frequent loss [of urine]; repeated involuntary loss of urine

sense.def: Illness Sign Combined Designation of yi niao 遺尿 , involuntary loss of urine, and xiao bian shu 小便數 , frequent urination. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 17: 寒則欠咳，小便遺數 , “Cold brings forth yawning and cough, and repeated involuntary loss of urine ”.
